sentences.en: ‘I'll be perfectly OK on my own.’ ‘Famous last words,’ she thought to herself.
sentences.cn: “我靠自己完全没问题。”“但愿如此，”她心里想。

sentences.en: "Robinson Crusoe" is one of the most famous books in the world.
sentences.cn: 《鲁宾逊漂流记》是一本世界名著。

sentences.en: a famous actor
sentences.cn: 著名演员

sentences.en: Da Vinci’s world-famous portrait of the Mona Lisa
sentences.cn: 达•芬奇的那幅闻名世界的肖像画《蒙娜丽莎》

sentences.en: He became famous as an inventor of astonishing visual and aural effects.
sentences.cn: 他因发明了神奇的视听效果而出名。

sentences.en: He became world famous for his popularisation of science.
sentences.cn: 他因对科学知识的通俗化而闻名世界。

sentences.en: He is the bowler-hatted figure in the foreground of Orpen's famous painting.
sentences.cn: 他是奥彭那幅名画中位于前景的戴圆顶硬礼帽的那个人物。

sentences.en: His apartment was the most famous literary salon in Russia.
sentences.cn: 他的公寓是俄国最著名的文学沙龙会所。

sentences.en: Julie Burchill is famous for her precocity and rapier wit.
sentences.cn: 朱莉·伯奇尔因其早慧和机敏而闻名。

sentences.en: Later he was to become famous as a pacifist.
sentences.cn: 后来他就变成了一位知名的和平主义者。

sentences.en: Many famous people have stayed in the hotel.
sentences.cn: 许多名人都曾下榻这家酒店。

sentences.en: Miss Famous, as she was called, was a gem.
sentences.cn: “知名小姐”人如其名，是个尤物。

sentences.en: She is a pole dancer at London's famous Spearmint Rhino club.
sentences.cn: 她是伦敦著名的“薄荷犀牛”夜总会的钢管舞舞者。

sentences.en: The chalky soil around Saumur produces the famous Anjou wines.
sentences.cn: 索米尔周围的白垩质土壤出产著名的安茹葡萄酒。

sentences.en: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark (= a famous place or building that is easy to recognize ) .
sentences.cn: 埃菲尔铁塔是著名的地标。

sentences.en: The public has an insatiable appetite for stories about the famous.
sentences.cn: 公众对名人有着难以满足的好奇心。

sentences.en: The town of whitby was immortalised in Bram Stoker's famous Dracula story.
sentences.cn: 惠特比镇因为布拉姆·斯托克著名的吸血鬼故事而名传后世。

sentences.en: The town was famous in antiquity for its white bulls.
sentences.cn: 该镇在古时以其白色公牛闻名。

sentences.en: They had come to the world's most famous pick-up joint.
sentences.cn: 他们来到了全世界最有名的寻花问柳之地。

sentences.en: With nothing but his own talent, he made himself rich and famous.
sentences.cn: 他一无所有，仅靠自身才能就变得富有而出名。

trans.tran_en: known about by many people in many places
